## 4. Customization Parameters

- Email Subject: "Probation Confirmation Compliance - Action Required for Your Team"
- Teams Channel: "HRBP Compliance Notifications"
- Message Body: Includes manager-specific Markdown table as above.
- Audit Log: Action timestamp, recipient email, number of employees listed, successful delivery flag.
